member.name: XAUDIO2FX_REVERB_I3DL2_PARAMETERS
member.summary: Describes I3DL2 (Interactive 3D Audio Rendering Guidelines Level 2.0) parameters for use in the function.

member.name: XAUDIO2FX_REVERB_I3DL2_PARAMETERS.WetDryMix
member.summary: Percentage of the output that will be reverb. Allowable values are from 0 to 100.

member.name: XAUDIO2FX_REVERB_I3DL2_PARAMETERS.Room
member.summary: Attenuation of the room effect. Allowable values in hundredths of a decibel are from -10000 to 0.

member.name: XAUDIO2FX_REVERB_I3DL2_PARAMETERS.RoomHF
member.summary: Attenuation of the room high-frequency effect. Allowable values in hundredths of a decibel are from -10000 to 0.

member.name: XAUDIO2FX_REVERB_I3DL2_PARAMETERS.RoomRolloffFactor
member.summary: Rolloff factor for the reflected signals. Allowable values are from 0.0 to 10.0. Rolloff factor is ignored for built-in reverb effects.

member.name: XAUDIO2FX_REVERB_I3DL2_PARAMETERS.DecayTime
member.summary: Reverberation decay time at low frequencies. Allowable values in seconds are from 0.1 to 20.0.

member.name: XAUDIO2FX_REVERB_I3DL2_PARAMETERS.DecayHFRatio
member.summary: Ratio of the decay time at high frequencies to the decay time at low frequencies. Allowable values are from 0.1 to 2.0.

member.name: XAUDIO2FX_REVERB_I3DL2_PARAMETERS.Reflections
member.summary: Attenuation of early reflections relative to Room. Allowable values in hundredths of a decibel are from -10000 to 1000.

member.name: XAUDIO2FX_REVERB_I3DL2_PARAMETERS.ReflectionsDelay
member.summary: Delay time of the first reflection relative to the direct path. Allowable values in seconds are from 0.0 to 0.3.

member.name: XAUDIO2FX_REVERB_I3DL2_PARAMETERS.Reverb
member.summary: Attenuation of late reverberation relative to Room. Allowable values in hundredths of a decibel are from -10000 to 2000.

member.name: XAUDIO2FX_REVERB_I3DL2_PARAMETERS.ReverbDelay
member.summary: Time limit between the early reflections and the late reverberation relative to the time of the first reflection. Allowable values in seconds are from 0.0 to 0.1.

member.name: XAUDIO2FX_REVERB_I3DL2_PARAMETERS.Diffusion
member.summary: Echo density in the late reverberation decay. Allowable values as a percentage are from 0 to 100.

member.name: XAUDIO2FX_REVERB_I3DL2_PARAMETERS.Density
member.summary: Modal density in the late reverberation decay. Allowable values as a percentage are from 0 to 100.

member.name: XAUDIO2FX_REVERB_I3DL2_PARAMETERS.HFReference
member.summary: Reference high frequency. Allowable values in Hz are from 20.0 to 20000.0.
